summary: Premium animated event website for 'National Level Project Expo 2026' organized by E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College (ECE Dept). Green gradient theme (#0f9d58 → #22c55e), glassmorphism UI, smooth scroll animations, Poppins/Inter fonts, fully responsive. Features 9 sections separated into distinct pages: Home, About, Event Details (timeline), Coordinators (profile cards), Registration (form + validation + success popup), Admin Login (Firebase Auth), Admin Dashboard (table, search, delete, CSV export, analytics), Contact, and Footer.
architectural_notes: Green gradient theme: #0f9d58 → #22c55e with glassmorphism cards (blur + hover glow)
Fonts: Poppins or Inter; fully responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Sticky transparent navbar with scroll progress indicator
Firebase Authentication used for Admin Login
Registration data stored/retrieved via Firebase for Admin Dashboard
Multi-page routing: Home, About, and Event Details are separate pages/routes rather than scroll sections
Admin-only access: only the authenticated host/admin can view all registrations and edit registration details
All site content (event details, coordinators, about info, etc.) must be editable by the authenticated admin (athiakash1977@gmail.com)
known_issues: Admin login password mismatch — user reports 'password is wrong' when attempting to log in with Akash@8667099605

existing_features.title: Implement a sticky transparent navbar that becomes semi-opaque on scroll, with smooth anchor navigation to all sections, a hamburger menu on mobile, and a scroll progress indicator bar at the top of the viewport. Use Poppins or Inter font throughout the entire site.

Build a Hero section with: an animated particle or mesh background with a dark green overlay, the event title 'National Level Project Expo 2026', a tagline, E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College (ECE Department) branding, a live countdown timer targeting the event date, a real-time registration counter (fetched from backend), and a glowing 'Register Now' CTA button that smooth-scrolls to the Registration section. All elements should have entrance animations (fade-in, slide-up).

Build an About section describing the Project Expo, college identity, and featuring 3 glassmorphism feature cards: (1) Innovation, (2) Inter-College Participation, (3) Certificates & Prizes. Each card should have a distinct icon, brief description, hover glow effect, and scroll-triggered fade-in animation.

Build an Event Details section displaying: event date, venue, registration fee, eligibility criteria, project categories, and an animated vertical timeline showing key event milestones (e.g., Registration Open, Submission Deadline, Expo Day). Timeline items should animate in sequentially on scroll.

Build a Coordinators section with glassmorphism profile cards for Faculty Coordinators and Student Coordinators. Each card should show a circular photo placeholder (avatar initials fallback), name, role/designation, phone number, and email. Cards should have a hover lift-and-glow animation and be grouped by Faculty vs Student.

Build a Registration section with a validated form containing fields: Full Name, Email, Phone Number, College Name, Department, Project Title, Category (dropdown), and Abstract (textarea). On successful submission, save the registration to the backend canister and display an animated success popup/modal. Show inline validation errors for required fields and email/phone format.

Implement an Admin Login page (route: /admin/login) with an email and password form. Authentication must use a hardcoded admin credential check stored securely in the backend canister (since Firebase Authentication is not supported). On successful login, store an authenticated session in frontend state and redirect to the Admin Dashboard. Show an error message on failed login.

Build an Admin Dashboard (route: /admin/dashboard) accessible only to authenticated admins. It must display: analytics cards (total registrations, registrations by category), a searchable and paginated table of all registrations with columns for all form fields, ability to delete individual registrations (with confirmation), and a button to export all registrations as a CSV file.

Build a Contact section with E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College address and contact details, a Google Maps embed placeholder (static image or iframe placeholder), and social media icon links (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube). Include a decorative section header with scroll animation.

Build a Footer with: 'Organized by ECE Department, E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College, Nagapattinam' branding, copyright notice (© 2026), quick navigation links to all sections, a scroll-to-top button that appears after scrolling down, and the college logo/name. Footer should use a dark background with green accent.

Implement global scroll animations: all major section headings and content blocks should use Intersection Observer-based fade-in and slide-up entrance animations. Apply smooth CSS transitions for page-level interactions. Ensure all glassmorphism cards use backdrop-blur, semi-transparent backgrounds, and green glow on hover. Apply the green gradient (#0f9d58 → #22c55e) as the primary brand gradient across buttons, section accents, and decorative elements.

Generate a custom hero background image: a dark deep-green abstract tech/circuit pattern with glowing green nodes and lines, suitable as a full-width hero background with a dark overlay applied on top in the UI.
